name: Slapsgiving 3: Slappointment in Slapmarra
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Cristin Milioti
plot: In an attempt to deliver a devastating final slap to Barney, Marshall explains how he mastered the Slap of A Million Exploding Suns.
